snippet: The pro-Obama "super PAC" that has spent millions of dollars attacking Mitt Romney in ads is pulling commercials from Florida and Wisconsin, part of what the group says is a realignment of its advertising campaign.
abstract: The pro-Obama "super PAC" that has spent millions of dollars attacking Mitt Romney in ads is pulling commercials from Florida and Wisconsin, part of what the group says is a realignment of its advertising campaign.

headline.main: Priorities USA Action Pulls Ads From Florida and Wisconsin
